mapper.insert: insert into pins (pins.m_id, tag, img_path, width, height, seed, n_tag) values (#{mId}, #{tag}, #{imagePath}, #{width}, #{height}, #{seed}, #{nTag})
mapper.select: SELECT pins.p_id, member.nick, pins.img_path, pins.tag, pins.n_tag, pins.width, pins.height, pins.seed FROM pins INNER JOIN member ON pins.m_id = member.m_id ORDER BY pins.p_id DESC LIMIT #{amount} OFFSET #{offset}
